Judul: Australian bushfires hit businesses, damage still being assessed
Teks: As Australia’s deadly bushfires rage, many companies are reporting hits to business with resorts shutting their doors, cheesemakers struggling to secure milk supplies and insurance claims on the rise.

Judul: European shares tumble on Middle East tensions; oil stocks near two-month high
Teks: European shares extended losses on Monday as tensions following the killing of a top Iranian general by the United States kept buying restricted to safe havens, while energy stocks benefited from higher oil prices.

Judul: Delhi police, facing criticism, probe attack on students at elite university
Teks: Delhi police are investigating how masked men burst into a premier university and attacked a student protest with sticks and rods, an officer said on Monday, the latest incident to ignite criticism of India’s ruling Hindu nationalists.
